name: Robert STOKES, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Stokes v. Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County

parties: Robert STOKES, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 1st day of May, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is GRANTED to the extent it seeks mandamus relief. The Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is DIRECTED to adjudicate Petitioner’s habeas corpus petition within 90 days.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
113 A.3d 1245
Robert STOKES, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 28 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 1, 2015.
